title: The Lead matrix
brief_description: Shows various industrial uses of lead, including pipes, roofing, insulation against radiation, noise and vibration, caulking and sheathing, solder, printed circuits and battery plates. Lead compounds have many uses in glass, ceramics, plastics and fuel.
